alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 5:37AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following county, Logan. * WHEN...Until 745 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 437 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Russellville, Danby, Cave Springs, Whippoorwill, Gordonsville, Crossroad and Homer. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
